Text: Please leave feedback on what you think of the upload.  This is my first upload here so if you are all happy expect to see more.
Also for future reference, would you like me to post them in full dvd like this with all the extras etc or would you like me to just post the movie itself.  Feel free to comment on this question.
well the full dvd would be nice and some seeds would be even better thank you and keep up the FULL dvd's
